name: RoboportLandfill
title: Roboport Landfill
author: TheStaplergun
description: Places landfill ghosts in the construction radius or logistic radius of roboports when they are placed in the world. Can be toggled off and on, along with changing between logistic and construction radius with shortcuts. Works with ANY roboport from any Mod that has any size radius. Does not lag or hang while operating.
